constructor-arg.value: SELECT m.id, m.name_russian, m.name_native, m.year_of_release, m.description, m.rating, m.price ,m.picture_path,c.id AS country_id,c.name AS country_name,g.id AS genre_id,g.name AS genre_name FROM movie AS m LEFT JOIN movie_country mc ON mc.movie = m.id LEFT JOIN country c ON c.id = mc.country LEFT JOIN movie_genre mg ON mg.movie = m.id LEFT JOIN genre g ON g.id = mg.genre
SELECT g.id, g.name FROM genre AS g;
